MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD14 postcode area of Eyemouth. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:59pm. Our engineers are on site working to repair a broken jumper cable near Rangers Cottage and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:00pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:25pm on Saturday, 31 October 2020
